title: Telerik Reporting: Export On Button Click
content:
I'm posting this mostly for my own benifet since every time I need it I spend 20 minutes googling around to get the code snippet again. So here's the acticle: [LINK](https://www.telerik.com/support/kb/reporting/designing-reports/exporting-a-report-to-pdf-programmatically.aspx) Here's the Code:
**So you can change the extensions to the following:** * IMAGE * PDF * RTF * MHTML * XLS * CSV * XPS This comes from here: [LINK](https://www.telerik.com/help/reporting/programmatic-exporting-report.html)
seoDescription: How to wire up a report download to a button click with Telerik Reporting
